field.colorControlMethod: The commands used to control color. AUTO will use HUE if the device supports, otherwise XY
field.fanModeSequence: Possible fan modes that may be selected
field.onTime: Time in 100ms steps to automatically turn off when sent with timed command
field.offWaitTime: Time in 100ms steps to ignore ON commands after an OFF command
field.defaultMoveRate: Move rate in steps per second
field.offTransitionTime: Time in 100ms intervals to transition from ON to OFF
field.onTransitionTime: Time in 100ms intervals to transition from OFF to ON
field.onOffTransitionTime: Time in 100ms intervals to transition between ON and OFF
field.invertReportControl: Invert all level control reports received from the device
field.invertLevelControl: Invert all level control commands sent to the device
field.defaultTransitionTime: Default time in 100ms intervals to transition between ON and OFF
field.pollingPeriod: The time period in seconds between subsequent polls
field.reportingChange: The minimum change of the attribute value needed to trigger a device state update
field.reportingTimeMin: The minimum time period in seconds between device state updates
field.reportingTimeMax: The maximum time period in seconds between device state updates
field.txPower: Sets the device radio power. Power level is defined in dBm
field.trustCentreJoinMode:
Sets the Trust Centre join/rejoin mode. TC_JOIN_DENY: Deny all joins.
TC_JOIN_SECURE: Allow only secure joining. Devices should join with the TC Link Key or a Device Specific Link Key via an install code.
TC_JOIN_INSECURE: Allow all joins.
TC_JOIN_INSTALLCODE: Only join with install code. Devices attempting to join with the TC Link Key will be rejected
field.powerMode: Enabling boost mode improves the receive sensitivity by 2dB and increase the transmit power by 3dB
field.panId: Personal Area Network Identifier. This parameter is unique in a certain ZigBee network. This means that it will be the same in all the related devices, including the Coordinator (Meshlium or Gateway) and the Routers or End Devices (Waspmotes)
field.networkKey: The key is defined as 16 hexadecimal unique id. If not defined, a random key will be created. Set the current network key in use by the system
field.meshUpdatePeriod: Sets the update period for the mesh update service. This is the number of seconds between subsequent mesh updates. Setting the period to 0 will disable mesh updates
field.linkKey: Sets the Trust Center link security key to the specified value
field.installCode: Sets an installation key for the specified address. Using a blank key (ie all zeros) may be used to remove the install key. This is dongle specific if the key can be removed or if it will time out
field.extendedPanId: Sets the ZigBee Extended PAN ID to the specified value
field.channelId: Sets the ZigBee RF channel. The allowable channel range is 11 to 26 for 2.4GHz, however the transport implementation may allow any value it supports

description.contact_switch: The magnetic contact, seen by the device as a switch that is on when the contact is open
description.analog_input: The Analog Input (Basic) cluster provides an interface for reading the value of an analog measurement and accessing various characteristics of that measurement
description.multistate_input: The Multistate Input (Basic) cluster provides an interface for reading the value of a multistate measurement and accessing various characteristics of that measurement
description.color_color: The color cluster allows to control the color of a light. It is also possible to dim values and switch the light on and off
description.door_state: Locks and unlocks the door and maintains the lock state
description.electrical_activepower: The total power consumed by the device
description.binaryinput: Indicates a binary input sensor state
description.ias_tamper: Indicates if a device is tampered with
description.measurement_illuminance: Indicates the current illuminance in lux
description.metering_instantdemand: The instantaneous demand from the metering system
description.metering_sumdelivered: The total delivered from the metering system
description.metering_sumreceived: The total delivered from the metering system
description.sensor_occupancy: Indicates if an occupancy sensor is triggered
description.switch_onoff: Switches the power on and off
description.switch_level: Sets the level of the light
description.thermostat_localtemp: Indicates the local temperature provided by the thermostat
description.thermostat_outdoortemp: Indicates the outdoor temperature provided by the thermostat
description.thermostat_occupiedheating: Set the heating temperature when the room is occupied
description.thermostat_occupiedcooling: Set the cooling temperature when the room is occupied
description.thermostat_unoccupiedheating: Set the heating temperature when the room is unoccupied
description.thermostat_unoccupiedcooling: Set the cooling temperature when the room is unoccupied
description.thermostat_systemmode: Set the system mode of the thermostat
description.thermostat_runningmode: The running mode of the thermostat
description.thermostat_heatingdemand: The level of heating currently demanded by the thermostat
description.thermostat_coolingdemand: The level of cooling currently demanded by the thermostat
description.warning_device: Triggers warnings on a warning device
description.windowcovering_lift: Sets the window covering level - supporting open/close and up/down type commands
description.tuya_button: Emits events when button is pressed
